name: Rose Ftz

last_movies.title: 体内的怪物 第八季
罪恶黑名单 第三季

introduction: Dynamic global citizen who has had the opportunity to perform in London and NYC, and is still hungry for more!Best Actress Award Winner for her chilling performance as Lucy in Game Over (2018) by the Halloween International Film Festival, and ranked in the top three actresses three times on the Indie Series Network for her performance as Franziska Wilhelm in Under InspeKtion (2015). Other notable projects include Skyphire Entertainment's "Camisado" (2020), Paternoster Productions' award-winning Still Falling (2014), as well as her own series Experience Curve (2017) and film Still Trying (2019) available on Amazon.In NYC Rose has performed with Sinking Ship Creations and Incantrix Productions in addition to performing Off-Broadway at Hudson Guild Theatre and Theatre for the New City. While in London she performed Off-West End at Greenwich Theatre and in several Secret Cinema and Future Cinema immersive productions.Rose earned her BFA Theatre Performance degree from Stephen F. Austin State University in Texas, which included studying European Theatre Arts abroad at Rose Bruford College of Theatre and Performance in London, UK with further training at the Estonian Academy of Music and Theatre in Tallinn, EE.
